name: Aim Force
description: terrorist smoke - is a game where there are several modes: deathmatch, team deathmatch, test, gg. In the game, you play as a special forces or terrorist. your task is to kill more people. In test mode, there are cars and tanks on the test map.. where you can sit down. controls: W, A, S, D Jump: Space, Crouch: C. #shooter #action #multiplayer #terrorist#counter #police #gun #map
